SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_log (id, user_name, operation, method, params, time, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_log set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, operation, method, params, time, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time from sys_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_name, operation, method, params, time, ip, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time from sys_log order by age desc,username asc
